main event: A resident of McKees Rocks, Pennsylvania reported seeing an unidentified flying object estimated to be 30 feet in diameter, orange in color, and hovering about 100 feet above the ground.
interesting points: The object remained stationary for about 5 minutes before suddenly accelerating and disappearing to the east,The observer heard a very faint humming sound as the object passed overhead,There was an apparent power failure in part of the area during the sighting,Another witness, a neighbor, corroborated the observer's account of the sighting,The object appeared to hover and change directions while giving off varied colored lights.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object described as being about 30 feet in diameter and orange in color
witness description: A resident of McKees Rocks and a neighbor who saw the same object
